abstract: A case of primary liposarcoma of the pericardium, an exceptionally rare localization, has been presented. The tumor localized in the region of the left ventricle and connected to the visceral wall of the pericardium was diagnosed in a 38-year old male. Histological, histochemical and immunochemical findings confirmed the diagnosis of the liposarcoma of the pericardium.
title: [Primary liposarcoma of the pericardium].
